code: @Test public void testEmptyCache() throws Exception {     DefaultProducerCache cache = new DefaultProducerCache(this, context, -1).     cache.start().     assertEquals("Size should be 0", 0, cache.size()).     // we never cache any producers     Endpoint e = context.getEndpoint("direct:queue:1").     AsyncProducer p = cache.acquireProducer(e).     assertEquals("Size should be 0", 0, cache.size()).     cache.releaseProducer(e, p).     assertEquals("Size should be 0", 0, cache.size()).     cache.stop(). }

@Test public void testCacheProducerAcquireAndRelease() throws Exception {     DefaultProducerCache cache = new DefaultProducerCache(this, context, -1).     cache.start().     assertEquals("Size should be 0", 0, cache.size()).     // we never cache any producers     for (int i = 0. i < 1003. i++) {         Endpoint e = context.getEndpoint("direct:queue:" + i).         AsyncProducer p = cache.acquireProducer(e).         cache.releaseProducer(e, p).     }     assertEquals("Size should be 0", 0, cache.size()).     cache.stop(). }
